revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: {{see also|xìcháng|Xīchāng}} ==English== {{wikipedia}} {{commonscat}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{q|from [[Wade–Giles]]}} {{l|en|Hsi-ch'ang}} ===Etymology=== From the {{bor|en|cmn-pinyin|-}} romanization of {{uder|en|zh|西昌||[[western|Western]] [[prosperity|Prosperity]]|tr=Xīchāng}}. ===Pronunciation=== {{rfp|en}} ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # {{place|en|county-level city|autonomous prefecture/Liangshan|p/Sichuan|c/China}} #* {{quote-book |en |year=1954 |last=Wiens |first=Herold J. |title=Han Chinese Expansion in South China |url=https://archive.org/details/hanchineseexpans0000wien/ |publisher=Shoe String Press |year_published=1967 |LCCN=67-16409 |OCLC=473651484 |page=290 |pageurl=https://archive.org/details/hanchineseexpans0000wien/page/290/ |text=Chao-erh-feng planned some fundamental measures to control the Lolo, including the construction of a through road between Lei-po and '''Hsi-ch'ang'''. Up to the present this has not been accomplished, however. The '''Hsi-ch'ang''' sector was finished as far as Chao-chio city and beyond to Yeh-lu-na-ta. |brackets=on}} #* {{quote-journal |en |year=1978 |month=February |title=The Long March (II) |journal=Eastern Horizon |url=https://archive.org/details/sim_eastern-horizon_1978-02_17_2/ |volume=XVII |issue=2 |location=[[Hong Kong]] |publisher=Eastern Horizon Press |issn=0012-8813 |oclc=751117974 |page=39 |pageurl=https://archive.org/details/sim_eastern-horizon_1978-02_17_2/page/39/ |column=2 |text=After a five-day rest at Huili, the Red Army continued its drive northward. Passing through the Yi nationality area of Tehchang, '''Hsichang''' the vanguard troops led by Liu Po-cheng made an alliance with the chieftains of the Kuchi tribe, and managed to neutralize the Laowu tribe. |brackets=on}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|historic}} {{l|en|Jiandu}}; {{l|en|Jianchang}} ====Translations==== {{trans-top}} * Chinese: *: Mandarin: {{t+|cmn|西昌|tr=Xīchāng}} {{trans-mid}} * Sichuan Yi: {{t|ii|ꀒꎂ}} {{trans-bottom}}
